relationships.description: Email correspondence regarding current events and personal logistics

analysis.purpose: To share information about Michael Wolff's book controversy and update on personal living arrangements
analysis.significance: Shows communication between legal professional and Jeffrey Epstein during time of significant political/media events

notable_quotes: Finally got the apartment so can 'move in' tomorrow.
Now being reported that Trump's lawyers sent a letter to MW's publisher demanding that they not publish the book.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present in this communication

illegal_activity.description: Email contains shared news article link about Michael Wolff's book and Trump administration legal actions - no first-hand illegal activity discussed

details: Reference to Michael Wolff's book 'My Insane Year Inside Trump's White House' and associated media coverage

public_knowledge.context: Michael Wolff's book about the Trump White House was widely covered in media in early 2018

analysis.summary: Kathy Ruemmler emails Jeffrey Epstein about obtaining an apartment and shares news about Trump's lawyers attempting to block publication of Michael Wolff's book about the Trump White House.
